title: Minimal Private Nonguaranteed External Debt
description: In 2022, Botswana had one of the lowest private nonguaranteed external debt stocks, amounting to just $4.35 million. This indicates a strong financial position in terms of private sector borrowing.

title: Negligible IDA Public and Publicly Guaranteed Debt
description: As of 2023, Botswana's public and publicly guaranteed debt under IDA was only $45,000, showcasing its minimal reliance on international development assistance.

title: Heavy Reliance on Coal for Electricity
description: In 2022, 96.19% of Botswana's electricity production came from coal sources, highlighting a significant dependence on non-renewable energy.
